snippet: A suburban Philadelphia teen charged with attempted murder in connection with a ricin-laced birthday card sent to try to scare off a romantic rival is headed to trial....

headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania Teen Charged With Sending Poison Card to Love Rival
headline.main: Pennsylvania Teen Charged With Sending Poison Card to Love Rival

lead_paragraph: A suburban Philadelphia teen charged with attempted murder in connection with a ricin-laced birthday card sent to try to scare off a romantic rival is headed to trial.
